# Baileys LLM Context

## Quick Start
- npm install @whiskeysockets/baileys
- Node 18+ recommended
- TypeScript preferred

## Key APIs
- makeWASocket() — Create connection
- useMultiFileAuthState() — Manage credentials
- sock.ev.on('messages.upsert', handler) — Listen for incoming messages
- sock.sendMessage(jid, message) — Send message

## Socket Docs
- Configuration: https://baileys.wiki/docs/socket/configuration/
- Connecting: https://baileys.wiki/docs/socket/connecting/
- Events Catalog: https://baileys.wiki/docs/category/socket/
- Sending Messages: https://baileys.wiki/docs/features/sending-messages

## Example Code
- Full example.ts (production patterns): https://github.com/WhiskeySockets/Baileys/blob/master/Example/example.ts

## NPM Package
- https://www.npmjs.com/package/@whiskeysockets/baileys

## Common Patterns
- Persist creds with `useMultiFileAuthState()` and `saveCreds()` on `creds.update`
- Use `fetchLatestBaileysVersion()` and log version
- Implement `getMessage` for retries/polls when needed
